publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-168 Jim Hume: What’s on your Plate? Campaign—That the Parliament congratulates NFU Scotland on the launch of its What’s on your Plate? campaign; further recognises the importance of collaboration with MSPs on such an initiative, and encourages MSPs to sign up to the online pledge supporting Scottish farming and Scottish produce.

S3M-168 What’s on your Plate? Campaign (lodged on 12 June 2007) Bashir Ahmad*, Bill Wilson*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Jeremy Purvis*, Jackson Carlaw*, David McLetchie*, Ross Finnie*, Patrick Harvie*, Kenneth Gibson*, Liam McArthur*, Jamie Hepburn*, John Lamont*, Bob Doris*, Mary Scanlon*, Jim Tolson*, Robin Harper*, Margaret Smith*, Karen Gillon*
S3M-168 What’s on your Plate? Campaign (lodged on 12 June 2007) Alasdair Allan*, Nanette Milne*

S3M-168 Jim Hume: What’s on your Plate? Campaign—That the Parliament congratulates NFU Scotland on the launch of its What’s on your Plate? campaign; further recognises the importance of collaboration with MSPs on such an initiative, and encourages MSPs to sign up to the online pledge supporting Scottish farming and Scottish produce. Supported by: Bashir Ahmad, Bill Wilson, Hugh O’Donnell, Jeremy Purvis, Jackson Carlaw, David McLetchie, Ross Finnie, Patrick Harvie, Kenneth Gibson, Liam McArthur, Jamie Hepburn, John Lamont, Bob Doris, Mary Scanlon, Jim Tolson, Robin Harper, Margaret Smith, Karen Gillon, Alasdair Allan, Nanette Milne
S3M-168 What’s on your Plate? Campaign (lodged on 12 June 2007) Iain Smith*
S3M-168 What’s on your Plate? Campaign (lodged on 12 June 2007) Mr Jamie Stone*
